munit:config.name: create-appointment-test-suite.xml
munit:config.doc:description:
As part of this test suite I would like to test below scenarios
1. Given valid payload, Verify appointment is creted or not. 2. Verify schedule date in request date is futute or not. 3. Given valid payload and appoinment created, Verify the insertResult variable contains generated key. 4. Given valid payload and appoinment created, Verify the response to user contains generated key ++ payload or not. 5. Verify the responses when an invalid payload is sent
